verses.verse: <S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> has <S%H1129>built<s%> her <S%H1004>house,<s%> she has <S%H2672>hewn<s%> out her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5982>pillars:<s%>
She has <S%H2873>killed<s%> her <S%H2874>beasts;<s%> she has <S%H4537>mingled<s%> her <S%H3196>wine;<s%> she has <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6186>furnished<s%> her <S%H7979>table.<s%>
She has <S%H7971>sent<s%> forth her <S%H5291>maidens:<s%> she <S%H7121>cries<s%> on the <S%H4791>highest<s%> places of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
<S%H4310>Whoever<s%> is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in here: as for him that <S%H2638>wants<s%> <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she <S%H559>said<s%> to him,
<S%H3212>Come,<s%> <S%H3898>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which I have <S%H4537>mingled.<s%>
<S%H5800>Forsake<s%> the <S%H6612>foolish,<s%> and <S%H2421>live;<s%> and <S%H833>go<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
He that <S%H3256>reproves<s%> a <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H3947>gets<s%> to himself <S%H7036>shame:<s%> and he that <S%H3198>rebukes<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man gets himself a <S%H3971>blot.<s%>
<S%H3198>Reprove<s%> not a <S%H3887>scorner,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H8130>hate<s%> you: <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man, and he will <S%H157>love<s%> you.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> instruction to a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man, and he will be <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2449>wiser:<s%> <S%H3045>teach<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> man, and he will <S%H3254>increase<s%> in <S%H3948>learning.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
For by me your <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and the <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> shall be <S%H3254>increased.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> you shall be <S%H2449>wise<s%> for yourself: but if you <S%H3887>scorn,<s%> you <S%H905>alone<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.
For she <S%H3427>sits<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of her <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H3678>seat<s%> in the <S%H4791>high<s%> places of the <S%H7176>city,<s%>
<S%H4310>Whoever<s%> is <S%H6612>simple,<s%> let him <S%H5493>turn<s%> in here: and as for him that <S%H2638>wants<s%> <S%H3820>understanding,<s%> she <S%H559>said<s%> to him,
But he <S%H3045>knows<s%> not that the <S%H7496>dead<s%> are <S%H8033>there;<s%> and that her <S%H7121>guests<s%> are in the <S%H6010>depths<s%> of <S%H7585>hell.<s%>
